column2: input4MIPs 1850-2014 transient and mean datasets of volcanic aerosol extinction
Take annual mean of integrated shortwave aerosol extinction at 550 nm from the HadGEM3 input grid
Take sum of extinction * thickness of each layer = total optical depth
Multiply by -18, which is the OD to ERF relationship in HadGEM3, from online model tests as part of the SMURPHS project
Revert to CMIP5 ERF time series for years prior to 1850, scaled by 18/26 and quiescent year positive ERF from 1850-2014 (~0.107) added back
